job.title: UI Software Engineer
job.description:
Responsibilities
  • Contribute to flagship products as part of a creative cross-functional team
  • Work closely together with design team and UI/UX experts and leverage design as code concept.
  • Building automated frameworks for safe production deployments which can easily be maintained and operated by SRE's
  • Always learn and bring new concepts and technology to your team
Requirements
  • Work experience in some of the following areas: Javascript, Typescript, Python, Rest APIs, React, Angular,
  • Produce front-end code and visual components to create a polished and highly functional user interface with a focus on usability and simplicity of design
  • Eager to learn enough about whatever tools or tricks are needed to make things work
  • Cares about readable, performant, reliable, and secure code
  • UI developer that designs, develops, tests, reviews code, documents and deploys
  • 3+ years of experience
Your Key Interests
  • Mobile development, using cross platform UI design and code
  • Following latest trends on UI technologies, and UI development processes
  • Automated testing of UI functionality
  • Cloud environments such as AWS, Google Cloud Platform and Azure
